metadata.summary: Ingest Google Workspace audit logs into LimaCharlie by routing them through GCP and using cloud-to-cloud adapters
metadata.primary_use_case: Monitor and analyze Google Workspace user activity and security events by ingesting audit logs

cross_refs.description: GCS adapter is one option for ingesting Google Workspace audit logs after GCP configuration
Pub/Sub adapter is the recommended option for ingesting Google Workspace audit logs after GCP configuration
Tutorial demonstrates the Pub/Sub approach that can be applied to Google Workspace logs
